summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6267 for the improvement of the alley between Block 1 and Block 2, Carleton Park Terrace Second Division Addition, being the alley between 35th Ave. West and 36th Ave. West from West Armour Street to West Raye Street; and a certain other street and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91371, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
